update.description:
I loaded all the example worlds and tried the instructions in them.

Fixes include:

* Adding light to dark worlds
* Substituting references to the duck mesh with mesh models from Fuel. We need to keep in mind that these worlds are installed and can't depend on relative paths.
* Added instructions to worlds missing them
* Fixed a few instances of `<updateRate>` -> `<update_rate>`
* Changed the plane on `lights.sdf` to use a plane pose instead of a slanted normal, due to #26
* Enabled `gpu_lidar` test, thanks to @iche033 's tip that the Ogre2 issue had been solved.

---

During my testing, I noticed that about 50% of the time `ign-gazebo` crashes on shutdown, the most common backtrace being this one:

~~~
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(0x7f7f0fd83f20) [0x7f7f0fd83f20]                                                                                                     
/home/developer/ws/install/ignition-gazebo2/lib/libignition-gazebo2.so.2(_ZNK8ignition6gazebo2v222EntityComponentManager13EntityMatchesEmRKSt3setImSt4lessImESaImEE+0x6d) [0x7f7

/home/developer/ws/install/ignition-gazebo2/lib/libignition-gazebo2.so.2(_ZN8ignition6gazebo2v222EntityComponentManager11UpdateViewsEm+0x72) [0x7f7f0d5a81e2] /home/developer/ws

oper/ws/src/ign-gazebo/src/EntityComponentManager.cc:267                                                                                                            
/home/developer/ws/install/ignition-gazebo2/lib/libignition-gazebo2.so.2(_ZN8ignition6gazebo2v222EntityComponentManager8SetStateERKNS_4msgs15SerializedStateE+0x659) [0x7f7f0d5a
d369] /home/developer/ws/src/ign-gazebo/src/EntityComponentManager.cc:828                                                                                           
/home/developer/ws/install/ignition-gazebo2/lib/libignition-gazebo2-gui.so.2(_ZN8ignition6gazebo2v29GuiRunner7OnStateERKNS_4msgs14SerializedStepE+0x3d) [0x7f7f0d913bdd] /home/d
eveloper/ws/src/ign-gazebo/src/gui/GuiRunner.cc:83                                                                                                               
/home/developer/ws/install/ignition-gazebo2/lib/libignition-gazebo2-gui.so.2(_ZN8ignition9transport2v719SubscriptionHandlerINS_4msgs14SerializedStepEE16RunLocalCallbackERKN6goo
gle8protobuf7MessageERKNS1_11MessageInfoE+0x75) [0x7f7f0d922035] /usr/include/c++/8/bits/std_function.h:687                                                      
/home/developer/ws/install/ignition-transport7/lib/libignition-transport7.so.7(_ZN8ignition9transport2v710NodeShared26TriggerSubscriberCallbacksERKNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcSt
11char_traitsIcESaIcEEESA_SA_RKNS2_11HandlerInfoE+0x5a7) [0x7f7f0b85b2e7] /home/developer/ws/src/ign-transport/src/NodeShared.cc:463

Fixes include:

* Adding light to dark worlds
* Substituting references to the duck mesh with mesh models from Fuel. We need to keep in mind that these worlds are installed and can't depend on relative paths.

update.title: [Blueprint] Tweaks to example worlds

update.description:
I loaded all the example worlds and tried the instructions in them.

Fixes include:

* Adding light to dark worlds
* Substituting references to the duck mesh with mesh models from Fuel. We need to keep in mind that these worlds are installed and can't depend on relative paths.
* Added instructions to worlds missing them
* Fixed a few instances of `<updateRate>` -> `<update_rate>`
* Changed the plane on `lights.sdf` to use a plane pose instead of a slanted normal, due to #26
* Enabled `gpu_lidar` test, thanks to @iche033 's tip that the Ogre2 issue had been solved.

---

During my testing, I noticed that about 50% of the time `ign-gazebo` crashes on shutdown, the most common backtrace being this one:

~~~
